text: landing day 12:30 p.m. the spacecraft is
minutes away from touchdown on Mars one
of the team leaders Peter Smith watches
the live feed from Mission Control this
mission could reveal the mysteries of
life on Mars careers are at stake come
on let's see it
but something is wrong
the truth slowly dawns on everyone the
lander has smashed into the surface feel
terrible what we do now nine years have
passed since the Mars Polar Lander
disaster now Peter Smith faces this
terrifying moment once more this time
with the Phoenix lander we lost our
chance with polar Lander and now we've
got another chance
Phoenix is coming back from the ashes
Peter Smith has taken on this crusade
determined that Phoenix will succeed
where Polar Lander failed he's staking
his career on the hope that Phoenix
could find signs of life on Mars
